name: Individual Investigations in Painting
description: This course is a continuation of FAS345Y. Students develop a cohesive body of self-directed work reflecting an understanding of contemporary and historical painting. Regular critiques are supplemented by gallery visits, and an introduction to professional practices and art criticism. Artist statement, gallery and visiting artist reviews, contemporary Canadian or international artist presentation, as well as portfolio documentation required. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS345Y5, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC and P.I.
